website_summaries.verdict: This mounting case offers some water protection and storage for small items like keys.
pros: Works with cellphones measuring 6 inches or less
Waterproof case made with polyurethane and PVC
Touch screen window lets you use your phone
Visor shields screen from sunlight, and lets you use phone out in daylight
Hook-and-loop strap design allows quick installation and release
Dual zipper pocket for ample storage

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof as stated!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is misrepresented as "waterproof" but it is NOT waterproof at all. I rode in the rain and all my belongings in this frame bike bag got wet (phone, wallet & car keys).
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Much more useful than the phone holders with stretchy silocone
customer_reviews.text: Much more useful than the phone holders with stretchy silocone. This allows me to store my bungee cords, keys, wallet, and i love how there are two zipper tabs with loops so you can use a small lock in needed. My other swag zipper bike bags do not, which annoy me, but this has it, so its very functional. The touch screen works great. The only thing that is annoying is if you get a call, you can't access the phone quickly, but i will pull over and put the call on speaker. but that's not much different than other phone holders. Anyways, long story short, this is a great functional add on to my bike, i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P.H.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my older handlebar phone bag.
customer_reviews.text: Was searching for a handlebar phone bag that would fit an iPhone 8 Plus. Overall, I didn't like the build quality of this bag. The clear plastic was thinner and flimsier than that of an older bag that I had from another manufacturer. The visor was thinner than it appeared in the photos and was almost like a sheet of plastic paper. The zippers would stick and I would struggle a little to open the bag. I can't recommend this. They could have used better materials and I would have gladly paid $6 more. Will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Daisuke

customer_reviews.title: Phone fits PERFECTLY and stays secure
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bag! It fits nicely between my high rise handlebars but leaves just enough room for my water bottle holder and reflector light. The hook and loop fastener tape is thick and holds my extra large phone in place. The clear film does allow you to use your touch screen (a definite plus when listening to music and want to skip a song). It stays put with the hook and loop tape, even on those bumpy backroads. I don’t ride In the rain (on purpose) and I haven’t been caught in a downpour (yet 🤞) so I can’t attest to the water resistance but I really love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: good cheap solution to mount phone and battery
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my bike and rode over 70 miles with it no problem. It's not a particularly snug fit for an iphone 7 but touch functions do work and there's enough slack on the bottom to plug in a charger cable all inside the case. The phone won't sit centered since this is oversized but works sufficiently to see. I think a iphone plus would take up the full space but likely leave no room to plug in a charger cable. Was able to fit a battery pack in the pouch section to keep my phone charged for a 6 hour ride. There is no direct opening for headphones and the zippers stop at the bottom corners.
customer_reviews.author: BuyItOnce

customer_reviews.title: Durable, functional and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my bike. Stays secure on the bike while mounted and back on rack at rear of the vehicle and doing max of 45 mph. I can store my iPhone, vehicle keys, second iPhone and a couple of ID sized cards. Touch screen easy to use, large viewing area and the phone secured tightly inside the casing. Very pleased with this product. I am ordering another for my son to place on his mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mike from SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product but broke shortly after
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bag and worked great on my bike. But after a few months the top broke off even though i hadn't done pulled on it. It’s obvious from photo that it just wasn’t properly secure during sewing by manufacturer. I tried to contact seller for replacement but no one of contacting them. In addition, i paid $12 for it and now it is $28. I hope they see this review and replace it for me.
customer_reviews.author: OC

customer_reviews.title: Solid pouch that works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Touchscreen works great despit me being a bit skeptical about that when I purchased this. The pouch is definitely big enough for anything critical you would need to bring on your ride like keys, cash, if etc. The ouch sits very securely on the handle bars with three Velcro closures. While I wouldn’t recommend leaving it on your bike on a rack, mine has stayed put when I have done so up to about 40mph.
customer_reviews.author: Becky W

customer_reviews.title: NO headphone jack opening but a convenient and easy case
customer_reviews.text: This product is bulkier then expected. No, I did not measure it or look as specifications. I have a 5s and there is lots of room for a larger phone. Attaching it to my bike is easy and simple. It did not slip or slide as I thought it would. If it had an opening for a headphone jack that would make me love it (it does not)
customer_reviews.author: MMills

customer_reviews.title: Best Bicycle Accessory for the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this great bicycle accessory. In fact I bought mine a couple months ago and just bought another one for a friend in my seniors bicycling group who admired mine. I can see my iPhone screen clearly through the clear front AND use the touch screen through it. Keys and wallet fit nicely and securely inside. It mounts so easily yet securely on the center of the handlebars with three velcro straps. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The description said it fits phones up to 6". My LG is exactly that and even in its' case, it's kind of sloppy. There is more room in the bag though than I thought there would be, so that's good, but it's also kind of sloppy and wiggly on my handlebar stem even though I have the velcro straps tightened as much as I could. The weight of the phone pulls the bag down almost vertically so it's hard to read the screen when I'm riding.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P. Flohr

customer_reviews.title: Durable nice material
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and is nice sturdy material. I love that it mounts on the handlebars, I’ve tried other bike bags and they have all gotten in the way of pedaling. I haven’t tried the waterproof part of it-I tend not to go out for a ride if rain is forecasted. Fits my i-phone 6 plus perfectly. The only thing I wish it had was a port to use headphones with it.(Although I’m sure it doesn’t simply for the waterproof feature) But I can still plug in through the zipper and it doesn’t bother me. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it. wrong angle for viewing
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it. wrong angle for viewing, too vertical. Zipper pulled off on maiden voyage. Zipper's overly tight with rubberized layer under the zipper closure mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: B. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Great company to work with, I recommend this product for street rides, but not heavy trail use
customer_reviews.text: It did a decent job but the Zippers stick a bit. It also looks like the zippers are prone to being pulled out but I have definitely not babied it. I would like to tighten the gap but I fear I will make the sticking worse. Update: after about 5 rides and 80 miles the material on the bottom ripped around the stitching. I had a few tools, my phone, and an bike innterube all mounted. I would chalk this up to this product is not meant for such an intense ride. However it's perfect for street riding etc.
customer_reviews.author: B. Little

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not at all waterproof ; it couldn't just withstand a sparse rainfall . Water entered inside.
customer_reviews.author: Dheeraj

customer_reviews.title: Too big for an iPhone SE and very bulky
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bulky. I have an iPhone SE and my phone practically got lost in this. I ultimately had to return it because it wasn't sized well for my phone (making the touch screen impossible to use). It probably would work better for someone with an iPhone 8. And as a side note, it would have taken up WAY too much space on my handlebars. I ended up buying a different brand/style waterproof touchscreen phone holder at my local hardware store, which I love and works perfectly with my phone. I recommend looking local at your hardware store because you can test it out in person before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good for small items
customer_reviews.text: Good for my iphone 7 and my keys. The touchscreen part can accommodate to bigger screen phones. Mine seems swallowed up by it. Secures well to the handle bars- however it does not stick up like in the picture. I have a beach cruiser, so i don't know if that makes a difference. It faces me, and not straight up (which i don't mind really, as long as I can see my phone).
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: which has rendered it useless for me
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this bag was because I needed something to hold my phone, allowing me to access the touch screen while I was riding my bike. This bag was supposed to allow me to do just that, but it doesn't. My touch screen does not work while in this case, which has rendered it useless for me. The bag compartment size is decent and my keys and some snacks can fit in it which is why I gave it at least 2 stars. This will be a product that I will be returning. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavy duty resistance material, waterproof, front clear plastic is to thick and will make it difficult to navigate de
customer_reviews.text: Product is good material, feels strong enough to resist a temperature beating. However, the clear plastic does not let you access/control/manage your cellphone, since it will interfere with the touchscreen interface. Many times, you will need to take out the cellphone out if the bag, just to use the touchscreen interface. Front clear Plastic is either to thick or not good for touchscreen devices.
customer_reviews.author: Pab Barr

customer_reviews.title: Samsung s7 edge
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, I have a Samsung galaxy s7 edge in a thin plastic case and there's still a few milimeters of room on all 4 sides, I can still use the edge screen through this, everything works. Large enough for keys, chapstick, pepper spray and a couple other items. I no longer have to wear my running belt. It does sit at a low angle IF, I just rest the bag on the bar to my handle bars but if I tighten the Velcro strap very tight on my handle bar it holds it way more upright to see my phone screen better. Not that ill be texting and riding any way. Lol. I love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eric bettis

customer_reviews.title: Straps break and zipper does not close well
customer_reviews.text: Probably used it for less than a 1/2 dozen local rides. The zipper did not close well from the beginning but, with care, it was useable. Both straps broke on my last ride with the bag (first one, then the other followed). I had to tuck it into my jersey to ride home. It is now trash and not worth the trouble to try and replace. Buy another brand unless the company can improve the quality.
customer_reviews.author: srw

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Sit Upright if your Stem is on an Angle
customer_reviews.text: This bag appears well made and looks classy. But I could not get it to sit upright so I could see the route on my phone while I was riding. It pointed at my navel.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Techno Girl

customer_reviews.title: Recommended but for who works in the sun for too much hours no
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that protects. The touch really works and is very easy to attach to the bike. I just didn’t give 5 stars because I work in the sun and after a while this bag was getting too hot and my phone started to get too hot too, so the battery lower quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you have an iPhone 7plus!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not for an iPhone 7 Plus as described. Yes, it will fit in the slot provided; however it does not allow you to operate the phone. I have only used twice and both times the touch screen did not work through the plastic covering. The biggest issue is you cannot press the home button to even use the touch screen. If you’re looking for a place to store your phone, keys, etc. then this may be for you as that’s all it will do for you.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and clear
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag. Easily fits my iphone 7 Looks like it would fit the bigger phones too. Nice roomy compartment for keys and money. I use it for my garage door opener but there is plenty of room for more. And you can use your phone through the window but i dont do that while im riding, nice if you need a gps though.
customer_reviews.author: twinzmom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product cheaply made poor quality the touch screen feature does not work only used a couple times and all of the stitching around the velcro attachments came undone one of the three came completely off exposing holes thankfully Amazon being the most amazing and customer-focused merchant ever issued me a credit on my account 😃
customer_reviews.author: Marc H.

customer_reviews.title: Big and bulky
customer_reviews.text: It is really big and bulky. Not a huge fan of the clear plastic screen cover as its pretty thick and wavy. The velcro holds it on pretty well but I would suggest an emergency cord incase it breaks, I don't think it will be IF it breaks, but WHEN it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Hooded for easy reading
customer_reviews.text: I've had several types of cellphone holders over the past several years and this one is by far the best of them. The hood makes for much easier viewing on sunny days. The pack itself is nice convenient size for wallet, keys when out on the road. I was cleaning my garage and accidentally left my bike out in a heavy rain. The inside of the case of the pouch was completely dry afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Quality phone holder, could be more accessible.
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely a must for anyone who rides in unfamiliar locations, as the position on the bike centered in the middle makes it very easy to read a GPS if needed. The bag is great, and it truly is waterproof, as rain has not reached into it once on all my rides. However I would've liked to have seen a bit more accessibility with side buttons, as my phone does not have a frontal home button, so adjusting volume or turning the screen back on after idle was a hassle in hectic rides. Otherwise, it's a great product, and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for my bike. I wanted something small to hold my phone, and a few tools for my bike. I thought this was going to be big and bulky looking. Its not bad. Perfect for my needs and my bike looks good. I mounted it in a out of the way place (didn't want it on my handlebar). Perfect. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Alberti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect handlebar bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect handlebar bag bag. Touch screen responsive even through plastic protection. Ample storage area. For gloves, small tools or portable charger. I happen to fit all of those in there lol
customer_reviews.author: G300

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 bike rides (mountain bike, just mild, occasional off-road riding) it started tearing apart. It's rather wide, so my knees would sometimes hit it when pedaling but again, nothing too extreme. Just seems like fragile materials are used. I bought it off-season, so could not test before the return period was over. Tried contacting the seller but never got a reply.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this for my 12 year old son's bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT addition to my sons bike, especially as he is riving around town i want to know that he sees my messsages and gets back to me to let me know he is safe. Often he woudl put his phone in his bag and wouldnt see that i had messaged him to check in. This has solved this. We got a phone holder but this is great bc it protects his phone too and he can put a few bucks or a charger in there too. It doesn't interfere with this bike or the use of the bike either and keeps his phone in view without being distracting. Win win! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carey R ~ Mother of Pugs🐶

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, built wrong. Doesn’t sit at the correct angle needed for riding and following directions on gps.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great idea to hold a power bar for your phone ...
customer_reviews.text: the case is ok but due to the design of my bike, the case falls downward and is difficult to use. I may try to put a styrofoam block under it to hold it up more...Great idea to hold a power bar for your phone but you will need a small one to fit into this case.
customer_reviews.author: william manley

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Bag installs easily and i am able to switch between bikes easily. the touch screen does work through the clear plastic as advertised. i don't know about water resistance because it hasn't rained. i am not able to get to my phone's power and volume buttons through the bag but it probably is a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine & Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great way to see your tracking info while riding.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the rectangular shaped bike bag and was going to return it but didn’t. I ended up finding a way to attach this shape to my bike. I really like it. It’s nice to see what my phone is tracking while I am riding. Holds quite a bit too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. Sturdy material and looks to be very water resistant. Plenty of room. there is space for my keys, wallet & even my power bank. There is no headphone hole, but you can leave a gap in between the zippers and it works just fine. The angle is perfect as well.
customer_reviews.author: SergReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for bicycle rides, holds A LOT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bike bag to use for my 6S iPhone, my keys, eyeglasses, sunglasses, etc. when I go on my bike rides. It is large and roomy but not too bulky. It is well made. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dovesm

customer_reviews.title: Holds tight with just the handlebar straps
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a while for something to carry my phone and some other small things, everything i found was either too expensive for what it was or didn't have the right option to mount. Mounted on my enduro motorcycle with just the handlebar straps and it holds tight. Easy to get my phone in and out, just set the phone straps tight enough to hold my phone and loose enough to were i do not need to undue it every time i want my phone out. Good size and doesn't get in the way of my speedo.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Sunshade is too little to make a noticable difference, ...
customer_reviews.text: Sunshade is too little to make a noticable difference, bounces around a lot, and items will fall out of the storage area if completely unzipped. No outlet for earphones. TIght zipper, should be fairly waterproof. Almost identical to two other units advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kz

customer_reviews.title: POORLY MADE 😡😡
customer_reviews.text: I want to know if u can get a refund or exchange for another similar item. This thing ripped while I was mounting it on my bike!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy, works great on my Evo bicycle handle bar. Plenty of room for my phone, keys and a tire patch kit. I ride my bicycle on the trail and this bag helps me to safely secure my phone so that I can have access to the screen while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality...
customer_reviews.text: Product broke during first use! Product arrived and was cheaper looking then I had expected and during our first ride the straps broke off. The design and the purpose is great but the quality wasn’t what was expected!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberli

customer_reviews.title: NOT for use on trails!
customer_reviews.text: The material of this bag is too weak, it should only be used for riding on roads or smooth trails. Not for rock gardens, jumps, drops, or any other rough stuff. After three months of trail use on a mountain bike the main strap ripped off. The stitching held, but the material it was sewn to on the bag failed catastrophically. There is no fixing the gaping hole where the strap should be attached.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C Corder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my bike. Fits my phone and more. Can touch phone and using gps works great. Have not had it in the rain yet.
customer_reviews.author: JACK

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Securement With Storage, But......
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great but I can’t operate the touch screen on my iphone 8 plus with the plastic film on top of it. The new iphones are all water resistant so having that plastic film is not important to me. I may try removing it somehow. Design one with the option of not having one. Send me your first prototype, I will review it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It’s water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can install into either my road or mountain bike and just ride. I can have my AirPods or any Bluetooth headphones, and change songs or look at my Strava and see my results very easily. Used it in the rain, had no issues. Protected my ovine really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ever Balandran Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone holder I have ever had for my bike. It attaches easily and unobtrusively to the handlebar, has the hood to shield the sun so it's easier to see the phone and has a good deal of space in the bag beneath the phone compartment. I liked it so much that I purchased one for several of my biking friends as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Siciliana

customer_reviews.title: More room than you would think.
customer_reviews.text: Has plenty of room for a phone, house/car keys, tire levers, and spare tube. It is not as easy to use the phone screen as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is fits perfectly on both my bikes without any issues. The velcro is great since you can adjust to any size of the handlebar. It holds Samsung S7, keys, cloves, snack bar and cash, perfect for rain and sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, can't control volume or turn on your phone once placed in the holder. Also too loosey goosey when mounted. There are much better options!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent for $12
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and design. You get what you pay for so dont expect great quality for $12. The zipper on this probably wont last very long. Its the type thats too tight on the material so its going to zip itself up until it jams and rips. Otherwise nifty. Probably good for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Joey B

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This fits well on my handlebars, I wish I could say I used it for something really cool or tracking activity, but I use it to play PokemonGo. Screen protector works well against rain, and can still catch 'em all.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material, moves around a lot; the Velcro comes undone. This all happened within a 3 mile ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mark mccready

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE: Buckle on one side  and velcro on the other side broke/breaking after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: after 2 rides the buckle broke, bag tore and the Velcro is breaking it already about 1/2 way thru. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: The screen is extremely responsive but the 2 horizontal straps ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen is extremely responsive but the 2 horizontal straps are so close together it doesn’t sit on my handlebars correctly and is crooked. The angle is also wrong so I had to keep pulling on it to make it horizontal so I could see the screen.
customer_reviews.author: sugar5299

customer_reviews.title: Simple case for your ride.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is pretty convenient to have for your ride. It fits not only my phone, keys, wallet, and battery pack 21000+ by Anker. The zipper is not properly align around the edges. But it has not failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Y.

customer_reviews.title: works kind of
customer_reviews.text: does hold a phone well and keep it dry if u do not plan on charging your phone and having buttons randomly get pressed by water droplets. Also condensation will build up inside the bag causing random screen presses.
customer_reviews.author: blairlake24

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: The “ultra sensitive” touch screen panel, doesn’t work at all. Like I seriously couldn’t get any movement to show.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Zalar

customer_reviews.title: it is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this bag in the mail, but on my first bike ride the bottom velcro tore partially off the bag. I plan to glue it down and continue to use it, but I was hoping for a more durable product. But for the price, it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Annalee Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, I was able to fit my phone, extra tube, ID, Keys and some cash in this bike bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena F. C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think the screen would really work but it does and really well. Just enough room for my alen wrench, house key and credit card. Yea, I'd be nice to have a hole for the ear phone Jack but honestly it works fine just zipping all but the space for it topple through. I love this little pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Serina Faith

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product did not live up to what was advertised. It is not waterproof as my things placed inside while it was raining still got wet. One of the straps has come loose already and it doesn’t fit my iPhone 6 or 8 comfortably. If you want something cheap to carry your thing during the summer when it’s dry then ok but as for rainy days...I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Martin B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my bike. My Galaxy S9 Edge Plus with a case fits snugly. Any bigger and and it wouldn't. I can use my phone right through and it is indeed water tight!
customer_reviews.author: Megatron

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than i expected, over all it's a good product, can ride with my wifes phone and mine on the view
customer_reviews.author: Daniel JL

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not last more than a month. Front strap ripped off with minimal use. Nothing in the bag besides an iPhone 6, a handball and a small, 8oz water.
customer_reviews.author: Yossarian

customer_reviews.title: The zipper stitching is very bad
customer_reviews.text: On the second use, the zipper dislodged and was impossible to put together. The way the zipper and the plastic body are stitched together, makes it very easy to lose the zipper. Bad engineering.
customer_reviews.author: JimJim

customer_reviews.title: Great hone holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! It works great, I have no issues at all. The storage area behind the phone is very convenient to store keys and a billfold while riding the bike. I would definitely buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mac

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bag in terms of size and convenience but ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag in terms of size and convenience but the velcro is mounted wrong so it hard to close the interior flaps that support the cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproof and handy
customer_reviews.text: I have used and I like it It would be really easy for somebody to remove it and be gone fast tho' I wish it was more securely attached. It is a nice little space for valuables while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't let a drop inside and I live in the Pacific NW. Easy to use my screen and see it while biking. Straps hold the pouch in place well. Have had it for a while now and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alt Deadpool

customer_reviews.title: Good money value
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. Good money-value. It arrived in some delay for unclear reason. Because I was pleased with the product, my spouse also bought one for herself. The cons: the zipper feels a bit stiff and although the straps docking is stable, it feels that it could have been slightly better. Otherwise, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: oshri a

customer_reviews.title: A bit ackward
customer_reviews.text: I havent used it much. My phone doesnt face me because the bag sits to much upright on my bike. This is probably different on different bikes but it bothers me. Its also ackward if i need to use the buttons on the side of the phone. I did like the extra storage space. Never used in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and it holds my phone and wallet + a Ruger LCP gen1. Can't ask for much more. Lets me use Strava on my phone instead of buying a bike computer. My screen responds to touch through the cover fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kenabso

customer_reviews.title: Good value! Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take on and off bike, as well as holds keys, money, phone. Need to remind kids not to use while riding!!!!! Phone easily Velcros inside zipper compartment.
customer_reviews.author: love2laminate

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and works great. Has a small but spacious storage space below ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof and works great. Has a small but spacious storage space below the phone compartment. Can fit bike gloves, keys, phone, with room to spare. Attaches in three spots to bike handle, very secure. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tap816

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best phone holder. It has a glare shield. There’s room for keys ,and wallet.
customer_reviews.author: barry burton

customer_reviews.title: easy to keep my valuables in one place on bike
customer_reviews.text: easy to keep my valuables in one place on bike. Easy to see cell phone screen and touch buttons while I ride
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few rides with this bag and the stitching has come apart at one of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Hey Mikey, he likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he tells me how much he likes it and appreciates me for getting it for him. So it's a win win. Fits his lg big phone, shades for viability of screen and fits perfectly on handle bars.
customer_reviews.author: Eyerep

customer_reviews.title: Double thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It’s is water proof. Kept my phone dry during a down pour. Awsome bike bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Causes phone to overheat
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good pouch. However, if you're using it to store your phone on a hot day, it'll overheat the phone as there are no vent holes.
customer_reviews.author: Govind Mulanjur

customer_reviews.title: If the velcro straps were longer then I could position the case better on multiple bikes but the shortness of the strap ...
customer_reviews.text: Awkward straps due to length. If the velcro straps were longer then I could position the case better on multiple bikes but the shortness of the strap complicates things.
customer_reviews.author: lisamona

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love everything I need for riding my bike can be stored
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient and quality made. Holds my phone snuggly with the velcro and has a nice pocket for the little extras I take with me. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Bess

customer_reviews.title: Not adequate
customer_reviews.text: Not very secure on handlebars. Flops a little and plastic over screen not too tactile for typing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long trail and not getting lost
customer_reviews.text: it fits may galaxy s7 active perfectly,and very easy to install on the bike.. I can run my fun as a navi with the bag for 8hrs because you can put an external battery behind your phone securely..
customer_reviews.author: Juan Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to open and close zippers due to corners at top.
customer_reviews.text: Product ripped where velcro attaches when I was attempting to tighten velcro fasteners to bike.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Stays in place . Decent storage space. I have phone, external charger , wallet all inside . The phone screen works great as well
customer_reviews.author: Last one done

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it, and it does everything as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to attach to my bike. It protects my phone... I can see it while riding.. It also has a nice size of storage for my keys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: still use my phone
customer_reviews.text: fits great. I put my personal stuff in there and keep my gloves in there when not riding. easy to mount and allows me to use my phone thru the water proof screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but!
customer_reviews.text: Found the zipper extremely hard to get around the corners. SO much so that one of them has come apart. I do like that bag, the way it mounts, they amount of space, but the zipper appears to be an issue. The area for the phone is very large and perhaps too big for an iPhone 7. I may look to modify it so the phone sits in it better.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Touch Screen Actually works as stated!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it and was able to access my cell phone screen through the Waterproof touch screen. Works great! Would recommend this item. I had a different cell case for my bike, that claimed to be touch screen friendly, but it did not work. I was skeptical about this one, but it proved me wrong, because it works GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It broke in 6 month - DONT BUY- Buy cheap, pay dear.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. In 6 month i only used this bag like 6 times, one each month, just to keep my phone, ID and money. TRASH!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really work for my mini motorcycle... but my kid uses it for her phone storage
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product and good price. My phone fit well in it and there's room for other small items. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this carrier
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this carrier.. it serves its purpose and considering the price.. it is of great bargain.. EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Abel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It is nice. Phone fits great. Had the unfortunate occurance of having to use it in the rain. My phone stayed dry, but I had a paper map in the bag and that got wet. I would not recommend it for rain, but it is great for other weather. You can use the phone without having to take it out of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Just

product_meta.title: Bike Bag, Waterproof Touch Screen Bicycle Handbar Front Phone Frame Bag Holder for iPhone X 8 7 Plus 6s 6 Plus 5s 5 / Samsung Galaxy s7 s6 Note 7 Cellphone Below 6.0 Inch with Sun Visor
product_meta.description:
Specifications: 

1. Material: High qualit PU/PVC/Polyester 
2. Color: black 
3. Bag size: 7.8*4.2*4.3Inch 
4. Weight: 160g 
Features :
1. Storage cell phones, money, keys,ID cards and power bank 
2. Clear high sensitivity TPU window designed for touchscreen mobile phone 
3. Quick release system, easily be fixed with seatposts 

4 Anti-slip leather at the bottem 

Package includes:
* 1x Bicycle Handlebar Bag 

If you have any questions, please contact us immediately so that we may resolve the issue for you.
feature_bullets: Suitable for cellphone below 6 inches, like iPhone X 8 7 6s 6 plus 5s 5 / Samsung Galaxy s7 s6 note 7 and etc.
WATERPROOF Material: made by PU & PVC material; polyester material double thick inner pads, provide well SHACKPROOF for your phone when riding on rough road.

Sun VISOR & TPU touch screen: Sun Visor on the top helps you watch phone screen clearly even under strong sunlight. Sensitive touch screen window, you can easily hit functions on your phone and see the screen clearly through the transparent cover in any condition.
Velcro strap design for quick release and installation, you can cut the Velcro strap length depend on your bike.
Dual zipper pocket , safer for inside items and convenient to open or close

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
